titleStmt.title: The ark is begun to be opened, (the waters being somewhat abated) which with some papers and passages given forth by the Lord's servants I am thus to publish ... / John Pennyman.
titleStmt.author: Pennyman, John, 1628-1706.
Pennyman, Mary, 1630-1701.

notesStmt.note: Part of the text by Mary Pennyman.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
